headline: Why Rapid7 (RPD) Is Down 23.3% After Cautious Guidance and CFO Appointment Despite Strong Q3
summary: Rapid7 recently reported its third quarter 2025 earnings, highlighting revenue of US$217.96 million and new AI-driven product capabilities, while also announcing Rafe Brown as the incoming Chief Financial Officer effective in December. Despite exceeding revenue expectations and unveiling innovations, including an expanded Microsoft partnership, analyst sentiment has turned more cautious due to softer future guidance and increased pressure from industry competition. With Rapid7's leadership...
